titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bisphenol AF.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 4,4 (trifluoro-1 (trifluoromethyl) ethylidene) diphenol or 2,2-bis(4-hydroxyphenyl) hexafluoropropane (bisphenol AF).
